ValidationRule.description: #SE:2785 & SE-2431: Describe Other condition field is required if condition field value is set to Other
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT($Setup.HRCFSL_Org_Exception_Rule__c.HRCFSL_Validation_Rule__c), ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL( HRCSVC_Condition__c , 'Other') , ISBLANK( HRCSVC20_Describe_Other_Condition__c )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Describe Other Condition field is required if condition is selected as Other on Complaint Qualification
